code_files.context_snippet:
import os
import subprocess
import platform

class ExtensionBuilder(build_ext, build_ext_options):
    ...
    def check_compiler_flag(self, flag):
        supports_flag = True
        DEVNULL = os.open(os.devnull, os.O_RDWR)
        try:
            subprocess.check_call(
                " ".join(self.compiler.compiler)
                + " -march={flag} -E -xc - -o -".format(flag=flag),
                stdin=DEVNULL,
                stdout=DEVNULL,
                stderr=DEVNULL,
                shell=True,
            )
        except Exception:
            supports_flag = False
        os.close(DEVNULL)
        return supports_flag
